Real comprehension is essential if we are to recognize that this seemingly isolated event of international horror represents the greater reality of what is called a ''Trigger Event ,'' which is an external, mass event that is covertly orchestrated by seemingly unrelated ''hidden forces'' from “behind the scenes”—an event that represents the “pressing of the start button” within the invisible Illuminati World Management Team machine. Trigger Events are orchestrated strategically from off-planet sources in order to set in motion, through remote psychotronic mobilization of the unsuspecting on- planet Illuminati force, a series of national and global changes that are intended to move the global arena toward fulfillment of hidden Fallen Angelic/Intruder ET objectives.
